Salesforce Components - FirestoreService
Overview    Classes    Enums    Interfaces    Triggers    SObjects    Groups    Index




Class FirestoreService

public class FirestoreService

Methods to import/ export data from Google Firestore

Changes

04/03/2021 Initial version.
04/11/2021 FirestoreDocument: Class to deal with documents from Firestore.
04/11/2021 getDocument method: Now it returns the document as a FirestoreDocument object.
04/11/2021 Request.patchDocuments: New method to update Firestore documents.
04/11/2021 Request.addEndpointSuffix: Adds its content to the end of the endpoint URL.
04/11/2021 Request.addParameter: Allows adding parameters to the request.
04/21/2021 TransactionInfo class now stores the default tax for the venue.
06/03/2021 Class revamp: class only keeps methods related to Firestore service.
07/25/2021 Class to extract external Id from import settings.
07/25/2021 Support for secondary objects.
08/01/2021 ImportRecordsSettings class: Contains settings for ImportRecords class. Support for running class ImportRecords for specific venues and/ or a specific date range.
08/04/2021 Fix issue when Firestore access token length > 255 characters.
12/04/2021 Fix issue when account's external Id is blank, account is not included in query anymore.
03/05/2024 ImportRecordsResult.setConversionRates(): new method to set the conversion rates for the imported records based on the currency and the creation date.
03/10/2024 Method ImportRecordsResult.setConversionRates() removed. Conversion rates are now calculated in the classes that extended FirestoreService.ImportRecordsLogic.
08/26/2024 ImportRecords class: Account query conditions now uses IsCustomer__c field.
